title: Crest 3D White Toothpaste Radiant Mint, 3.8 Oz (Pack of 3)
description: Brighten your smile with Crest 3D White Radiant Mint Whitening Toothpaste. Removes 90% more surface stains*, protects against future stains & starts whitening your teeth after 1 brush. 3D White fluoride toothpaste also strengthens your tooth enamel and helps protect against cavities. Leaves your smile bright and minty fresh. *vs. regular toothpaste
